name: Super Soda Bomber
description:
Super Soda Bomber is a 2D Platformer game that combines simple mechanics and interesting levels in one!

  • Use ice to boost your soda explosive power!
  • Overhand and Underhand soda throwing that don't defy the Laws of Physics.
  • Fun and Challenging!
  • Beach and Caves!
  • Sound Design and Music!
  • Soda Burst to make you jump further!
  • And lastly, Milk Baddies! Blast them until they're spoiled.

You only have one goal: to reach to the finish and end the milk apocalypse!

CONTROLS:

  • A, S, D or their respective arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Click any mouse button to fire.
  • Click and Space to activate Soda Burst (must aim to the ground)

CREDITS:

  • Game by clementine803 (@FrancisIvanC)
  • Music by Lorenz Cabuling (L R N Z at SoundCloud)
  • My Siblings as playtesters (Frank and Derek)

And this is my first made game! Love from Philippines.

NOTE:

  • Easter Eggs.
